Package org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.corfu.mapper

Class CorfuMessageMapper

java.lang.Object
org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.corfu.mapper.CorfuMessageMapper
public class CorfuMessageMapper extends Object
This class implements a message transformer that can map CorfuTelemetry and CorfuTelecommand from their binary format into a JsonMessage format and back.

Note: This class is not thread safe! Do not use the object in more than one thread.

      public byte[] serialize​(CorfuTelecommand telecommand) throws CorfuSerializationException
      Serializes a CorfuTelecommand to its binary format.
      Parameters:
      telecommand - the telecommand object that contains the values that should be serialized
      Returns:
      the telecommand in its binary format
      Throws:
      CorfuSerializationException - if errors happen during serialization

    • deserialize

      public CorfuTelemetry deserialize​(byte[] data) throws CorfuDeserializationException
      Deserializes a CorfuTelemetry from its binary format to an actual Java object.
      Parameters:
      data - the binary format of a CorfuTelemetry
      Returns:
      the instantiated Corfu telemetry object containing all relevant information from the binary format
      Throws:
      CorfuDeserializationException - if errors happen during deserialization
